raw_text: Based on the observation (Haspelmath, 2002) that compositional collocations tend to be hyponyms of their head constituent, they propose a model which considers the semantic similarity between a collocation and its constituent words.McCarthy et al (2003) also investigate several tests for compositionality including one (simplex score) based on the observation that compositional collocations tend to be similar inmeaning to their constituent parts
